definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: princess, noble lady;—cstr. [[שָׂרָ֫תִי]] (Ges:§ 90 l) La 1:1; pl. [[שָׂרוֹת]] 1Ki 11:3, cstr. id. Es 1:18; sf. [[שָׂרוֹתֶיהָ]] Ju Jdg 5:29, [[תֵיהֶם]]- Is 49:23;—princess attending Sisera’s mother Ju Jdg 5:29; so Sol.’s wives 1Ki 11:3, other queens Is 49:23 (‖[[מְלָכִים ]]); wives of nobles Es 1:18; fig. of Jerus. La 1:1.
